duties_responsibilities.duty: Assume responsibility for the planning, organizing, development, and coordination of daily clinical activities of the Care Management staff and Social Work Discharge Planners.
Provide administrative and regulatory detail and support to the Care Management Staff to accomplish department’s goals and missions.
Collaborate with Physicians, Care Management Team, and other disciplines/departments.
Manage Care Manager RN Staff and Social Work Discharge Planners.
Coordinate all the RN Care Manager activities in the clinical area.
Make formal presentations relative to clinical, educational, and financial issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or Associate’s Degree and Substantial Work Experience Required- Masters preferred.
